name: Enable Core Patterns
author: UXL Themes

sections.description:
A simple plugin to enable (or re-enable) the core WordPress block patterns.

If you are using a theme that removes support for the core block patterns and you want to re-enable them, this is the plugin for you.

License

Licensed under the GNU General Public License v2.0,
http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’,
  2. Search for ‘enable core patterns’ and install the plugin.
  3. Activate ‘Enable Core Patterns’ from your Plugins page.

That’s it! No settings or complicated options.
Now when adding a pattern to your posts or pages, you will see the core WordPress patterns are available for selection.
sections.faq:
I have activated the plugin. Now what do I do?

Activating the plugin is all you need to do.

How do I go back to removing the core block patterns?

Simply deactivate the plugin and your site will once again default back to your active theme’s setup.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1 – March 2023
– Tested up to 6.2

1.0 – March 2022
– Initial release
